alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Jefferson; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 4:52AM CDT until August 03 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Crawford County in east central Missouri... Southwestern Jefferson County in east central Missouri... Northern Washington County in east central Missouri... Southern Franklin County in east central Missouri... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 452 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sullivan, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Union, Sullivan, De Soto, St. Clair, Hillsboro, Potosi, Bourbon, Anthonies Mill, Parkway, Cedar Hill Lakes, Miramiguoa Park, Old Mines, Richwoods, Dittmer, Lonedell, St. Cloud, Stanton, Oermann, Latty, and Mapaville. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 218 and 242. This also includes Washington State Park, Sandy Creek Covered Bridge Historic Site, and Meramec State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
